```{r}

plate3 <- plate3[,c(2:8)]
plate4 <- read_csv("S:/GlobalChangeEco/porewater_r scripts & Data/Data/Sulfide Microplate/COMPASS/2024 May/QAQC'd Data/COMPASS_H2S_20240528_plate4_Summary_Data.csv")
plate4 <- plate4[,c(2:8)]

plate5 <- plate5[,c(2:8)]
```

#combine plates 
```{r}
all_plate <- rbind(plate1, plate2, plate3, plate4, plate5, plate6, plate7, plate8)
head(all_plate)
```
```{r}
# export data
write.csv(all_plate, file="S:/GlobalChangeEco/Porewater_R scripts & Data/Data/Sulfide Microplate/COMPASS/2024 May/QAQC'd Data/COMPASS_H2S_202405_plate1-8_Summary_Data.csv")
```
